summary.span: 提供对有关触笔的一般信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to general information about a tablet pen.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何录制触笔的坐标，即使触笔离开的边界。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 此示例假定有调用`textBox1`，且， ，和事件连接到事件处理程序。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来确保`element`接收触笔事件，即使光标超出该元素的范围。Use the method to ensure that `element` receives stylus events even when the cursor goes out of the elements' bounds. 若要释放触笔，调用与设置为。To release the stylus, call with the set to . 方法返回`false`如果`element`不可见或启用。The method returns `false` if `element` is not visible or enabled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何录制触笔的坐标，即使触笔离开的边界。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 此示例假定没有调用`textBox1`，且， ，和事件连接到事件处理程序。This example assumes there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Vista 中，笔势，可能的系统笔势之一是指可以映射到导航或快捷方式命令具有短、 快速、 直笔画。In Windows Vista, a flick, one of the possible system gestures, is a short, quick, straight stroke that can be mapped to a navigation or shortcut command. 默认情况下，笔势上禁用， ，和。By default, flicks are disabled on the , , and . 在所有其他控件上启用了笔势。Flicks are enabled on all other controls. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定是否在启用了笔势。The following example demonstrates how to determine whether flicks are enabled on a . summary.span: 同步光标和用户界面。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可能需要确定光标所在的元素。Applications may need to determine the element on which the cursor is located. 如果应用程序使用动画，方法可能会返回已移出光标下面的元素。If the application uses animation, the method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor. 调用以确保返回正确的元素。Call to be sure that returns the proper element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取光标下的元素。The following example demonstrates how to get the element that is under the cursor. 调用确保返回正确的元素。Calling ensures that returns the correct element.
